entries.journal_entry_description: Vance Groten has some ideas about where you might find a security beacon.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Speak with Kippy Martin. She's a former security officer at Stonewall Labs, and Vance thinks she might still have her beacon.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: If you get rid of some of the starving flewts that are bothering Kippy, maybe she'll be more talkative.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Now that you've gotten rid of some of the starving flewts, try talking to Kippy again.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Kippy Martin did not have her beacon. Well, it's not available. Anyway, return to Vance and find out if he has any other ideas.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Vance suggested speaking with Walker Luskeske, also a former security officer from Stonewall Labs. Walker retired before the labs closed. It's possible he'll still have his beacon.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Walker Luskeske has always had a deep love of hunting, but is no longer able to pursue his hobby due to his age and poor health. He's willing to trade you his beacon for some hunting trophies that will let him relive his love of hunting through you.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Walker has one last target for your hunt. Collect perfect narglatch fangs. Any type of narglatch will do for this hunt, but Walker has uploaded the location of some rabid narglatches.
entries.task06_journal_entry_title: Hunt Narglatches and Collect Perfect Fangs
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Return to Walker Luskeske and give him the hunting trophies.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Return to Vance Groten. Perhaps he can fix the damaged security beacon that Walker gave you.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Sprywing has long eluded capture or defeat at the hands of a hunter. Walker would truly enjoy her talons as a hunting trophy.
entries.task09_journal_entry_title: Hunt Sprywing and Collect her Talons
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Mountain spineflap wings are a much sought after hunting trophy among Dee'ja Peak hunters. Collect some for Walker.
entries.task10_journal_entry_title: Hunt Mountain Spineflaps and Collect Unharmed Wings
